snippet: New York State’s Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation has invited the co-founders of the Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg outdoor markets in Brooklyn to participate in a pilot program at Jones Beach State Park as part of a...
abstract: New York State’s Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation has invited Eric Demby and Jonathan Butler, co-founders of Brooklyn outdoor markets Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg, to participate in SmorgasBar, pilot program at Jones Beach State Park as part of revitalization plan (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: New York State’s Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation has invited the co-founders of the Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg outdoor markets in Brooklyn to participate in a pilot program at Jones Beach State Park as part of a revitalization plan.

headline.main: At an 85-Year-Old Summer Retreat, a Makeover
headline.print_headline: At an 85-Year-Old Summer Retreat, a Makeover

keywords.value: SmorgasBar: Brooklyn by the Beach (Jones Beach, NY)
